title: T3 Turkey Red Kitty Bransfield PSA 4 to trade

posts.post_title: T3 Turkey Red Kitty Bransfield PSA 4 to trade
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mark
for cards I need to upgrade my T3 set.  Looking for the following:

Joss
Kleinow
M. McIntyre
McGraw
Magee
Pfeister
Sallee
Stahl
Chance
Bescher
Konetchy
Smith
Wallace

Also looking for nice "no ad" backs.  Plus, will consider other upgrades on cards graded 1 or 2 in my set (set #7 on registry - drumback)
